subject: Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: David Einhorn, a Manhattan hedge fund manager, emerged as a potential buyer of less than 49 percent of the Mets, with a sale price of $200 million.
snippet: David Einhorn, a Manhattan hedge fund manager, emerged as a potential buyer of less than 49 percent of the Mets, with a sale price of $200 million.
